[#condition-threshholds_site-visit]
====== Site visit

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:targeted-survey-ecological-community-protocol-shapes:condition-threshholds:site-visit`
|Label | Site visit
|Definition | Observations _MUST_ have a value for `tern:hasSiteVisit`.
|Comment | Observations following the Ecological community protocol are made in the context of a site visit.
